metadata.title: CVE-2014-9672 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Array index error in the parse_fond function in base/ftmac.c in FreeTypebefore 2.5.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) or obtain sensitive information from process memoryvia a crafted FOND resource in a Mac font file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4').
